Sinopse: In 1927 a huge crowd waits for concert of Aayush who has delayed the performance when the organizer tell his friend Nafisa to check on she finds that Aayush has silt his wrist backstage.The story goes back few years later in 1921 when Aayush was a piano player and caught eyes of rich a millionaire MR Wadia who tells him to learn music in York.As Aayush cant afford it Mr Wadia asks him to take care of his Mansion in York and in return he would take care of the expenses,things are going well until few months.But suddenly the mansion gets haunted by a spirit and Aayush believes that its because of a mistake he committed, he comes across Rose who can communicate with spirits.Rose decides to help Aayush and tells that the spirit wants revenge as it was hurt in the past and asks Aayush if he shares any past.Aayush at first denies but later tells Rose that sometime back Wadia's niece visited the house and treated him rudely and wanted him to take at a unknown place in a intoxicated state.In order to save himself Aayush hit a with log of wood and she passed away and its probably her spirit which is haunting him.—alex.mjacko@gmail.com
